meanings.definition: A small wooded hill or grove.
meanings.sent1: The children played hide-and-seek in the hurst.
meanings.sent2: We had a picnic under the shade of the hurst.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the hurst were having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The hurst stood like a green island in the field.
meanings.sent5: The birds chirped happily in the hurst.

meanings.definition: A clump of trees or bushes.
meanings.sent1: The hurst near the river provided shelter for many animals.
meanings.sent2: The hurst at the edge of the forest looked mysterious.
meanings.sent3: The hurst whispered secrets to the passing breeze.
meanings.sent4: The hurst resembled a group of friends huddled together.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed brightly in the hurst.
